level.heading: PRIORITY OF DISTRIBUTION IN THE EVENT OF A SHORTFALL (ยง 15-2818)

level.text: If the DC USTF experiences a shortfall, the available funds will be distributed in the following order:
To support the services designated as universal services; and
Any residual funds will be used to cover the costs associated with administering the fund.
The remaining costs associated with administering the fund will be paid as additional funds become available.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 8198 (October 3, 2003); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 8585, 8592 (October 7, 2011).
